# physicsBody

**Instance Property**

A component that is used for physics simulations of the model entity in accordance with the laws of Newtonian mechanics.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var physicsBody: PhysicsBodyComponent? { get set }
```
title: physicsBody
